trafsim.controllers
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  trafsim.controllers.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

Manage the relationship between GUI and mathematics model.

Constructor Detail

Controller

public Controller(IDM model)
Overload Constructor. Initialize the timer then create a RoadAreaGUI. The timer is set to make a top every 50 milliseconds and the initial delay is 0.

Method Detail

setModel

public void setModel(IDM model)
Parameters:
model - The model to set

getRoadAreaGui

public RoadAreaGUI getRoadAreaGui()
Returns:
the roadAreaGui

setRoadAreaGui

public void setRoadAreaGui(RoadAreaGUI roadAreaGui)
Parameters:
roadAreaGui - the roadAreaGui to set

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent arg0)
Update the velocity of all cars then update their position. This function should not be called manually.

Specified by:
actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener

addCars

public void addCars()
Add cars in the road of the RoadAreaGUI of this instance

addTrafficLights

public void addTrafficLights()
Add traffic lights in the road of the RoadAreaGUI of this instance

insertTrafficLight

private void insertTrafficLight(TrafficLight tl)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
Inserts the TrafficLight to the correct position in its carList property

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception when the traffic light can't be inserted in the carList

pauseSimulation

public void pauseSimulation()
Pause the simulation by stopping the timer. All configurations and cars are kept.

removeCars

public void removeCars()
Remove the cars in the road of the RoadAreaGUI of this instance

removeTrafficLights

public void removeTrafficLights()
Remove all the traffic lights in the road of the RoadAreaGUI of this instance

removeTrafficLight

private void removeTrafficLight(TrafficLight tl)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
Removes the TrafficLight from the carList

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception when the traffic light can't be removed from the carList

repaint

public void repaint()
Repaint the road area

resumeSimulation

public void resumeSimulation()
Resume the simulation by starting over the timer. The configuration is the same than before the pause.

startSimulation

public void startSimulation()
Start the simulation. Add cars, add traffic lights then starts the timer.

stopSimulation

public void stopSimulation()
Stop the simulation. Stop the timer, remove all cars and all traffic lights then repaint the road area.
